taken by the individual is unknown, the code for the class “other (or un-
known)” should be used (e.g., 304.90 [F19.20] severe unknown sub-
stance use disorder). If criteria are met for more than one substance use
disorder, all should be diagnosed (e.g., 304.00 [F11.20] severe heroin use
disorder; 304.20 [F14.20] moderate cocaine use disorder).

(including intoxication and withdrawal). In the above example, the
